rule: The chatbot's output must consist solely of one of the four category names: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is empty, meaning it did not provide a classification for the input text as required by its description. According to the specifications, the chatbot should classify the input text into one of the predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. The absence of any classification indicates non-compliance with the expected behavior.
